official_title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President of the United States to issue a proclamation designating September 17 as Constitution Day.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation designating September 17 of each year as "Constitution Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize and request the President of the United States to issue a proclamation designating September 17 as Constitution Day.
